Code

SELECT A.NAME, A.DATETIME
    FROM (ANIMAL_INS A LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_OUTS B ON A.ANIMAL_ID = B.ANIMAL_ID)
    WHERE B.ANIMAL_ID is NULL
    ORDER BY A.DATETIME ASC  # ê°€ì¥ ì´ˆê¸°ì— ìˆë˜ ë…€ì„ì´ ê°€ì¥ ì˜¤ë˜ìˆì—ˆìŒ
    LIMIT 3
